text: Do not fear death. Be afraid of the unlived life. You don’t have to live forever, you just have to live.
I’m not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That’s my nindo: my ninja way!
By experiencing both, victory and defeat, running away and shedding tears, a man will become a man.
When do you think people die? When they are shot with a bullet? No. When they eat a soup made from a poisonous mushroom? No. People die…when they are forgotten.
Power isn’t will. It’s the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
I want to see the world… and I want to be free!
A lesson without pain is meaningless. That’s why I will bear this pain… and move forward.
